conjecture: For all monic real-rooted polynomials p, q of degree n >= 2 with simple roots, the finite free Fisher information Phi_n satisfies: 1/Phi_n(p boxplus_n q) >= 1/Phi_n(p) + 1/Phi_n(q), where boxplus_n is the MSS finite free additive convolution and Phi_n(p) = sum_i H_p(lambda_i)^2 with H_p(lambda_i) = sum_{j != i} 1/(lambda_i - lambda_j).
author: hybrid-orchestrator
